programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Cannon gets hired to be a bodyguard for a courier of securities.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: In Hawaii, J.R. is framed for murder and thrown in jail by a vengeful cop.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday lands in hot water after a thief he attempted to apprehend, and in the process shot at, turns up dead and SID can't find evidence that the man fired at Friday.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Three con artists have been swindling businessmen from out of town by posing as a prostitute and two policemen. The detectives set a trap as Gannon pretends to be a manufacturer from Lincoln, Nebraska.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.sub-title: Log 172 -- Boy...the Things You Do For The Job
programme.desc: After Malloy gives a gorgeous wealthy blonde a traffic ticket, she stalks him, affecting him and the police force. Although uninterested in her, Malloy is forced to "take one" for the job.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.sub-title: Log 92 -- Tell Him He Pushed Back A Little Too Hard
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed respond to repeated calls about an argument between two men and their wives over a boat they co-own. The feud escalates and ends with a fatal conclusion.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony's new podcast sets out to finally uncover the truth about Mr. Quizzer's real age."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver, Gilbert and Richard find a burro for sale in Mayfield and they each decide to go in $10 for it. After getting their parent's permission, Richard and Gilbert fight over who gets to keep the burro, which they name Pepe. However, once they get a load of just how destructive a burro can be, they dump the problem of room and board on Beaver.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Eddie pompously announces that he's dropping out of school to get a high paying job at a gas station. However, all is not as it seems when Wally and Lumpy get a glance at Eddie's new free spending life.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Gilded Lily
programme.desc: Enid Griffin, the secretary of Stewart Brent, attempts to commit suicide after learning her boss has married. Arthur Binney attempts to blackmail Stewart Brent with facts about his new wife having been in jail for fraud. When Binny turns up dead, Brent is framed for his murder, but confesses to protect his wife.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Cartoonist Ron Winfield has been keeping Atlanta enthralled with his recent storyline involving a Senator's affair. But just before the woman in the affair is named in print, the strips disappear.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Bubba tries to rescue a woman from a rapist, but she mistakes him for her attacker. Gillespie tangles with an ambitious district attorney who plans to use the case to further his career.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Boone Walton returns after he was convicted of moon-shining andJason promises to keep watch on him

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Three baby boys are born on a stagecoach that arrives in Dodge just after being robbed. Their mother dies and Doc fights to keep the boys together instead of going to an orphanage.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights and Candy are captured by a man known as "The Judge," who turns them into slaves, forcing them to work in his gold mine.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is baffled when the marshal of a neighboring town refuses to hold a gambler who just attempted murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark is paralyzed, Lucas attempts to cure him at the mission.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "With his clever tall tales, old prospector Henry Shannon talks Charlie Wooster into coming with him to search for a gold mine. When Hawks finds out about this, he rides out after the two men, along with Shannon's grandson Duke. Also following the old men are three men who hope to grab the gold for themselves."

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: Captain Stanley freaks out when he learns one of his past captains is now his Battalion Chief, causing the others to worry about his increased paranoia. Two men’s carelessness starts a fire at a gas station. A new hospital administrator causes problems. A woman accidentally shoots her husband with a nail gun. Two clowns start a fight at an ice rink. A car leaves an overpass and crashes into a transfer truck filled with pesticides.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Charles becomes so irate when he is turned down for a future medical position at home that he refuses to talk to anyone in the unit, until Hawkeye and B.J. send him a false telegram from home. Meanwhile, a young soldier, Jerry Wilson, can't remember his own identity, so Sidney Freedman is called for help.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: As the temperatures reach triple digits, Hawkeye and B.J. receive their new rubber bathtub from Abercrombie & Fitch. However, soon the whole camp is hot under the collar as word leaks out about the tub and everyone wants a dip, except for Klinger, who is trying to get his Section 8 by wearing a fur coat.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A strong windstorm affects the M*A*S*H personnel in varying ways: Hawkeye and most of the unit busy themselves securing items that could blow away; Radar prepares his animal hutch for the worst; a disgusted Charles switches his Tokyo-leave transportation from air to ground and runs into a difficult medical situation en route to Seoul.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Captain Tom Greenleigh of "Stars and Stripes" comes to the 4077th to write an article about Charles, which makes him act even more egotistical than usual.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: When Opie and his friends find a hungry man in the woods who tells them the story of Robin Hood, the boys begin to steal for the man.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney is the laughingstock of the town after he mistakes the owner of the Mayberry Bank as a robber.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro is getting ready to enter the reserves, and the Clampetts are giving him a party, with gifts, including lady fingers, a squirrel rifle and a Confederate uniform. Jethro heads down to the reserve where they are preparing to shoot a Civil War movie. The men there think Jethro is an actor for the movie. Jethro soon thinks that the Civil War is going to happen again and rushes home to tell Granny and Elly. Granny decides to take up the fight to make sure the South wins, again, since she is convinced they won the first time.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.sub-title: A Groom For Sergeant Carter's Sister
programme.desc: Sgt. Carter objects to the man with whom his sister is engaged, and uses Gomer as a means of breaking them up. Little does he know, the brother-in-law-to-be also is a Marine.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan gets Schultz to portray Klink in order to free three of his men whom the Gestapo has captured.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: To get a Italian officer to defect, Hogan and the gang use pizza to tempt him.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Peggy Lee And Tim Conway
programme.desc: "Guests Peggy Lee and Tim Conway. Originally aired on 03/30/70."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Missing Button
programme.desc: A man's campaign to prove his estranged wife an unfit mother is interrupted when he's arrested for murder.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.sub-title: The Last Rites Of Jeff Myrtlebank
programme.desc: A man comes back to life at his own funeral and soon begins to act very strangely.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A woman shares a party line with two nosy neighbors.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: An innocent man faces death in the gas chamber for the death of a girl.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix gets involved in the case of a millionaire's wife accused of killing the boyfriend of her stepdaughter.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: "Cannon gets hired to protect a girl but when her supposed pursuer is found dead he finds himself charged with murder."

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: In Hawaii, J.R. is framed for murder and thrown in jail by a vengeful cop.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A nervy bank robber uses innocent women to help commit his crimes. Friday and Gannon are nearly sidetracked when one of the victims lies about her involvement and later proves to have a criminal record of her own.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Bill invites Joe to dinner and a football game at his home in Eagle Rock. The only problem: Gannon's neighbors keep interrupting the visit with petty and then not-so-petty problems.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.sub-title: Log 22: So This Little Guy Goes Into This Bar, And...
programme.desc: "A fur burglary, a family fight and a loud party."

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: On their day off, Malloy and Reed agree to give a talk to a group of fifth grade students, and then offer to let the kids watch them train for the California Police Olympics. But when the tires of their patrol car are slashed and a stopwatch goes missing out of reed's car, the two officers start to suspect one of the children.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony visit some of the most mysterious places on earth."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: A communication gap ensues when Wally wants to spend the night at Lumpy's and Beaver wants to have Gilbert spend the night. Beaver asks June and she tells him he can sometime when Wally spends the night somewhere and Wally asks Ward, who tells him he can sometime when Beaver has someone spend the night.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver agrees to help Richard cart his family's clothes down to the laundromat; however, half way there they discover that Richard has lost the three dollars his mother gave him. This leads him to ask Beaver if he could use the Cleaver washer. They soon find themselves in another jam when the washing machine overflows after Beaver put in too much soap and starch.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Lazy Lover
programme.desc: Attempting to miss hitting her stepfather's car, Patricia Faxon swerves as she enters her driveway and hits the hedges. After asking her stepfather, Bertrand Allred, to move his car, he finds Bob Fleetwood badly hurt next to the hedges.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: When a cookie mogul is found dead after announcing plans to take over a number of baking companies, Matlock works the defense for another cookie maker suspected in the murder.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Sparta grieves after a drunk driver causes a fatal crash with high school cheerleaders on their way home from a game. While the officers try to find other driver, Althea tries to help the victim's families deal with their loss. The accident brings back painful memories for retired officer Tom Dugan. Meanwhile, district attorney Dutton accuses the department of being inadequate.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen starts taking pills to stay awake, and then to sleep.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt goes after three bandits who robbed a stagecoach and killed the driver and guard.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Joe searches for a professional fighter who can clear the name of an incarcerated Dusty Rhoades.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: New arrival Mario Arsatti becomes very friendly with Lucas, but this turns out to be merely pleasure before business: he's been hired to kill Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.sub-title: Old Man Running (aka The Wanted Man)
programme.desc: Lucas, who blames his wife's death on his father-in-law, refuses to help the old man elude gunmen.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "The Santee family---Will, his mother, and his younger sister---join the wagon train under a false surname. They have been forced out of town after town because of a terrible thing a family member did. They confide in Hale, Hawks, and Charlie, who agree to keep their secret from the others on the train. But it soon comes out anyway, and things get complicated when Will falls for a young woman from the wagon train."

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: A sporadic electrical short plagues the squad but Roy and John are convinced they can fix it. A back-to-nature couple is ordered to cut back on their shrubbery; the wife is discovered to have a variant of anthrax. The paramedics rescue a man trapped at the top of a tower.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: While everyone is complaining about the record cold snap, Charles becomes the most unpopular man in camp, when his parents send him a winterized polar suit that he insists on flaunting in front of everyone.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: In this unique episode, the camera becomes the eyes of a young wounded soldier. It records his sensory responses to being wounded, flown by helicopter to the 4077th, examined, operated on and treated in post-operation.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye and B.J. discover that Charles is living the "life of Riley," thanks to the attentions of his menially paid Korean servant, Comrade Park, a man of unusual skills. He has an important contribution to make—a native remedy for a seemingly insoluble medical problem.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Heavy casualties are arriving, creating severe problems for the M*A*S*H unit because they are nearly out of Pentothal. Mulcahy takes up a collection from everyone—including a case of wine from Charles' private supply—and he and Charles take the jeep to make a trade with the black marketers for Pentothal.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy pays attention to a fatherless new boy in town, which makes Opie jealous.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee and most of the women in town rally against Andy when he tries to evict a much-beloved butter and egg man.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed is looking for a beau for his gorgeous daughter, so Drysdale and Jane set Elly up with Fred Penrod, a young accountant at the bank. However, no one can seem to get his name straight. Meanwhile, Lafe Crick returns to plant a paw-paw tree in the back yard, really to look for the Clampett fortune he still believes is buried in the back yard.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Sgt. Carter asks Gomer to drive his car straight home from the airport after dropping him off. But sure enough, the car gets stolen, and Gomer has just one day to find it—or suffer the consequences.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Plans to destroy an anti-aircraft battery are upset by Klink's new executive officer.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.sub-title: How To Cook A German Goose By Radar
programme.desc: A new prisoner in a corporal's uniform turns out to be a general with a mission for Hogan.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Nanette Fabray And Michele Lee
programme.desc: "Guests Nanette Fabray and Michele Lee. Originally aired on 04/13/70."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Paper Bullets
programme.desc: Mason is caught between rival political families when the wife of a campaigning senator is accused of murder.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Kanamits, nine-foot-tall aliens, arrive on Earth with one lofty goal: To Serve Man.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: The arrival of a governess at the Wellington household has surprising results.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A researcher comes to a small-town bank to find out what happened at a robbery years earlier.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix tries to find missing building contractor Donald Jordan. He gets poor help from the man's partner, wife and sister. Each offers a different reason for his disappearance. When Jordan reappears, he assures Mannix that he's fine and asks him to drop the case.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: A military general hires Cannon to find the daughter he put up for adoption years ago but it appears as though someone doesn't want the girl to be found.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Betty's testimony in a trial puts herself in danger and gives her attention from an impressed reporter.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Sgt. Carl Maxwell, a frustrated fellow detective, goes AWOL; Friday and Gannon have three days to track him down before Maxwell loses his badge for good.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A series of daring daylight house burglaries are taking place perpetrated by an octogenarian who uses the wedding and obituary notices in the paper to select his victims.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed are on the lookout for the "Mulholland Mauler," who has raped six female hitchhikers and left them for dead. They quickly make an arrest of a likely suspect and take him to the location of an abandoned vehicle, after learning its owner never made it to her destination.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.sub-title: Log 52 -- Good Cop: Handle With Care
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed see a man passed out in an alley and stop to lend assistance, deliver bad news to a young wife, apprehend a mentally ill man who then becomes uncontrollably violent in their patrol car, and respond to a robbery that needlessly becomes a tragedy. All along the way the officers have their every move second guessed by a pair of young, unethical freelance journalists who are determined to document police brutality.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Ward allows his car to be driven by Lumpy, who must get Eddie, Wally and Beaver to a sporting event in a neighboring town. However, on the way back, Lumpy disobeys Ward's orders and takes a shortcut home.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: "When Wally has a previous engagement and is unable to babysit, Beaver fills in and quickly finds himself the object of a 10-year old's affection."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Prodigal Parent
programme.desc: When Philip Larkin, the owner of an import-export company, is murdered, his step-father, Joseph Harrison, is charged.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: A mother confesses to a murder to protect her daughter, but Matlock soon sees through the ruse.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: With the Chief in Quantico Bubba and Virgil try to catch a serial arsonist. Things get complicated after a man dies in one of the fires. And Councilwoman White stirs things up by appointing Tom Dugan acting chief of police in Gillespie's absence.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin meets a painter who wants to paint her portrait.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Chester doubts a man's deathbed murder confession, so he sets out to find the real killer.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben takes Jake on an extended tour of the Ponderosa to teach him a lesson after his recklessness destroys a wagon, killing a horse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The notoriously lazy Jackman brothers discover their mortgage has been foreclosed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and his girlfriend, Laurie, discover that an old hermit is very lonely.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "An Army general announces he is taking over the wagon train and requiring all members to act as soldiers in helping him rescue a trapped cavalry garrison of 120 men who are otherwise likely to be slaughtered by hostile Utes. Flint, temporarily in charge of the wagon train, has little choice but to agree to the general's demand, as much as he hates it and his passengers want him to fight back. Particularly upsetting to Flint is learning that the man who recommended this takeover was Jim Bridger, a legendary frontiersman and scout who mostly raised Flint and whom he ..."

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: Roy's mother-in-law is scheduled for her annual visit. A car runs into the back of a truck. Drs. Brackett and Early argue over attending a convention in Acapulco. An elderly man becomes ill from drinking a quack’s remedy. When a fire breaks out in a hospital room, the occupant goes into cardiac arrest. A boy’s model rocket sparks a house fire.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Father Mulcahy takes being passed over for promotion philosophically until he hears of the rapid advancement made by a heroic helicopter pilot. Then his uncharacteristically bold actions stun Colonel Potter and the entire company.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Father Mulcahy writes a pre-Christmas letter to his sister, who is a nun. He recounts his frustrations at not being more effective at the 4077th.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: B.J. almost becomes the surrogate father to a Korean family. Finding them a substitute for his own absent family, B.J. spends so much time with them that his medical efficiency begins to suffer, and Hawkeye worries about his health.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: It's instant attraction for Hawkeye when a beautiful Swedish doctor, called Inga, arrives to observe combat surgery. That is, until she upstages him in the operating room with a superior technique, and his ego is bruised.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney comes back from a police auction with a motorcycle and sidecar. After he upsets the whole town with the conveyance, Andy has to find a way to convince Barney to give up the bike.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy tries to make a silk purse out of a sow's ear when he takes it upon himself to turn Ernest T. into a presentable gentleman. The big test comes at Mrs. Wiley's weekly reception, at which Andy passes him off as his cousin.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny still believes she captured the real Ulysses S. Grant, still unsure that he is an actor in a movie. Granny also thinks that Colonel Blake is responsible for starting the second Civil War. Granny is upset at Blake, as well as Drysdale, for running away from battle. Drysdale tries to get in good with Granny by replacing Grant’s picture on the fifty-dollar bill with General Lee and tells her he captured Grant. Of course, she knows better.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: When Bunny gets mad once again at Sgt. Carter, he sends Gomer in to explain what really happened.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan convinces Klink he has ESP in order to get the plans to a new airplane with a silent engine.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.sub-title: The Prince From The Phone Company
programme.desc: An African prince comes to Stalag 13 to negotiate with the Germans for the rights to build a submarine base in his country. Hogan replaces him with Kinchloe.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.desc: "Family Sketch Show. Originally aired on 05/04/70."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Scandalous Sculptor
programme.desc: Scandal rocks the art world when a model is found dead, presumably murdered by the jealous wife of a sculptor.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An old man possessing the power of transformation tries to help a crippled little girl.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: Two kidnappers find a tanker in the middle of the desert and decide to make their escape in it.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A man schemes with a young woman to get rid of his wealthy wife.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: An old adversary from Mannix's time serving in the Korean War, whom he thought was dead, sets out to kill him.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: "An ex-convict boards an airplane in Atlanta for a reunion with his daughter but when the plane lands he's nowhere to be found."

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Barnaby tries to help her emotionally disturbed niece when she's suspected of murdering her husband and his lawyer during memory lapses.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: An elderly businessman concerned about the welfare of his grandchild informs Friday and Gannon that his daughter and son-in-law are using marijuana regularly. The young couple make no apologies for their lifestyle, which inevitably leads to disaster.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: An ex-con named Steve Deal contacts Friday and Gannon when a classified ad that he placed, offering to do "anything" for money, results in an offer to commit murder. Friday goes undercover as Deal.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.sub-title: Log 23: Pig Is A Three Letter Word
programme.desc: "The officers are subjected to verbal abuse when they arrest armed robbers."

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: An older husband complains about his wife and friend's noisy karate practice. A hit and run traffic accident looks looks like a homicide. The officers use their investigative skills to locate the suspect and arrest him.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony recieve a mysterious invitation."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver decides to join the basketball team but finds himself trying to live up to Wally's performance. However, after not making the team, Beaver allows his family to believe that he did.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Seeing an ad for typewriters on sale, Beaver talks his parents into letting him get one as long as he learns how to use it. However, Beaver discovers learning to type is not as easy as it looks and soon finds himself making a deal with the shady Eddie Haskell.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Black-eyed Blonde
programme.desc: A visit from an attractive blonde sporting a black eye segues into a case concerning a wealthy man's long-lost grandson and murder.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: When a blackmailing call girl is charged with murder, Matlock is hired to bring the real killer to justice.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: It seems that a serial killer has been burying his victims in a wooded area owned by a wealthy hermit that Virgil refers to as "Sparta's Howard Hughes". Suspicion immediately falls on an eccentric woman who lives in the woods with her pigs and chases away trespassers with a shotgun. The officers ask the landowner's disturbed son for help and Bubba is surprised to find that a woman he attended high school with is working as the man's "nurse". Also Parker and Sweet compete with one another to solve the case.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Corabeth Godsey feels trapped by her unchanging life on Walton's Mountain

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Newly attempts to save a hillbilly's life by using drastic measures. The family wants to hang Newly after the man dies.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Hoss helps send a man to prison, his wife insists that Hoss should be made responsible for their son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas McCain and his son, Mark, arrive in North Fork, New Mexico. Looking to start a new life, they come across a ranch that is to their liking, which is for sale. Lucas enters a Turkey Shoot in hopes of winning the down payment for the ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: "Two hired hands of a wealthy cattleman, who has been using the ranch for grazing his cattle, demand that Lucas move out. When Lucas refuses, he is beaten and dragged and then the ranch house is burned down."

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "Flint goes to visit Eleanor Culhane, an old flame of his who had been married to a notorious gunman. He finds everyone in the town she lives in shunning her, and unwilling to discuss her, because they blame her for her husband's misdeeds and the shame he caused the town. When Flint finds her they begin to rekindle their romance. But then her husband, thought dead for the last five years, shows up in town. And Flint realizes there is another side to Eleanor that he was unaware of as well."

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: Paramedics out in the field begin to question the judgment of overcautious Dr. Morton who believes in acting strictly by the book. The firemen respond to a complaint of severe back pain. A man with phosphorous burns on his arm and a boy hit in the head with a baseball are treated at the hospital. While the firemen respond to a case of difficult breathing, the victim’s neighbor drowns in a hot tub. Vince is involved in a traffic accident and goes crazy due to a head injury, pulling his gun on Johnny.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The 4077th is confronted by two crises: Colonel Potter's mare, Sophie, mysteriously disappears from her corral, and Hawkeye and B.J. find themselves with a young Korean boy on their hands, who is trying to avoid conscription into the Army.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A lecture on the latest techniques by a young surgeon from Tokyo, and a later demonstration of his surgical skill, turns Winchester into a drunk and Potter into an invalid, whilst bringing home to Hawkeye and B.J. that they are out of touch with new medical practices.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.sub-title: Hot Lips Is Back In Town
programme.desc: Radar, who is smitten with the cute new nurse, Linda Nugent, relies on Hawkeye's expertise on how to cope with the situation. Hot Lips, meanwhile, celebrates her just-granted divorce by taking a step that arouses Colonel Potter's ire.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The 4077th evacuation to a nearby cave to avoid US artillery fire on a Chinese target poses problems for Hawkeye, who has a claustrophobia problem of which Colonel Potter is not aware.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A lady prisoner woos Andy and Barney.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Otis has Mayberry worried when he buys a car.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro is hoping to get a part in Dash Riprock’s new TV series, getting a whole new image. Little does Dash know, the show, which is a rehash of every successful show since 1948, didn’t make it, and the female lead, Debbie Dimples, has impossible demands. Drysdale suggests that they use a monkey, Elly’s chimp Cousin, Bessie.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: On maneuvers, Sgt. Carter gives Gomer false information, hoping he'll be captured by the enemy camp.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan convinces Klink to get back in shape so he won't be sent to the Russian front.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan plans to get a trainload of stolen paintings back to London, but things get complicated when Marya uses Schultz to impersonate Reich Marshall Goehring.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.desc: "Guest Jim Nabors. Originally aired on 09/14/70."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Sleepy Slayer
programme.desc: When a man is accused of killing his employer, who still owed him $50,000 for an accident years before, it's up to Mason to find the real killer.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: To her parents' horror, a six-year-old girl vanishes into the fourth dimension after rolling under her bed.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A teenager’s desire to be free leads her to murder.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A man relates an unusual situation to his doctor.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Two elderly spinster sisters are determined to prosecute a traffic violator. There's only one problem: The man also is a syndicate killer.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: "Cannon is a victim of mistaken identity and later almost killed."

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: A runaway girl discovers that the glitter of the drug world has a deadly underside.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: A U.S. government top-secret camera falls out a plane and lands in the Shady Rest. Little does anyone know, the curious device could bring them "explosive" problems.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe decides to run as the first mayor of Hooterville.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Troubles are following everyone after the women’s lib movement ended. Elly and Granny return home to the mansion, while Jethro still believes he is Japanese and the women should serve him because women should wait on man. And at the bank, the secretaries are working on better working conditions, but get bullied by Banzai, who is trying to get new girls from Japan.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly gets a job as a secretary at Mr. Drysdale’s bank to ensure proper treatment of the girls working there. But Granny makes her look like a flapper and teaches her wiggle walking, eye rolling and lap setting. Drysdale throws her out, but after he realizes it is his largest depositor’s daughter, brings her back.

programme.title: Popeye and Pals
programme.sub-title: Plumbing Is A “pipe”, Her Honor The Mare, A Date To Skate
programme.desc: "Popeye visits Olive Oyl and discovers her home in turmoil because of a broken water pipe., Popeye's nephews decide to take a horse home when it's rejected by a glue factory., It's Olive's first visit to a skating rink, and Popeye accidentally crashes into the pillar to which she is clinging. Popeye manages to rescue Olive in an amusing climax."

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.sub-title: Tot Watchers, Early Bird Dood It, Sufferin' Cats
programme.desc: "A babysitter more concerned with the phone leaves Tom and Jerry to watch the baby., The worm enlists a cat to get rid of the bird chasing him but the bird turns out to be too smart for the cat., Jerry is a prize to be won between Tom and an alley cat because neither feline wants to share him."

programme.title: The Woody Woodpecker Show
programme.sub-title: The Dizzy Acrobat, Robinson Gruesome, Crazy Mixed Up Pup, The Reckless Driver, The Overture To William Tell, Dizzy Kitty, Who's Cookin Who?
programme.desc: "Woody tries to sneak into the circus., Chilly rides a melting iceberg to a south seas island, where Smedley has been stranded for 28 years., A man and his dog take on each other's attributes after an accident., Woody Woodpecker tries to renew his driver's license with a grumpy officer., Obstacles arise as Wally conducts an orchestra., Andy and his father try to groom an alley cat for a Cat Show., After failing to store food for winter, Woody attempts to turn the story of Little Red Riding Hood on its head by luring and eating a wolf. It turns out, they both want to eat each other."

programme.title: Bugs Bunny and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Million Hare, Tweetie Pie, The Foghorn Leghorn, Rhapsody Rabbit, Out And Out Rout, Woolen Under Where, A Witch's Tangled Hare
programme.desc: "A television show is having a contest to see who can get to the television station first, Bugs or Daffy. , When Tweety is brought in from the cold, the owner warns Sylvester to leave him alone. , Henery Hawk, determined to hunt chickens, goes down to Foghorn's barnyard. Henery Hawk misinterprets the dog for a chicken and Foghorn tries to set him straight. , Bugs Bunny attempts to perform a piano solo of Liszt's "Second Hungarian Rhapsody" but is foiled by a little mouse. , Coyote tries many different ways to catch Road Runner but is never able to. , It is another day at work for Ralph Wolf and Sam Sheepdog. , In search of poetic inspiration, William Shakespeare comes across the castle of Macbeth and finds Witch Hazel chasing Bugs Bunny therein. "

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night Of The Egyptian Queen
programme.desc: Agent Artemus Gordon and the curator of the San Francisco Museum are set upon in the Egyptian exhibit by three men wearing gas masks. When agents West and Mr. Heisel, the Egyptian government's representative, enter the room, they are also attacked. After regaining consciousness, the men discover that a priceless ruby has been stolen from the eye of the statue of Sun God, Ra. Commissioned by Miasmin, an Egyptian Princess, to recover the gem, West and Gordon trace a ransom note to a waterfront bar where Gordon poses as a sea captain. At the bar, West recognizes one of his assailants at the museum. The man identifies himself as Jason and indicates that Rosie, a beautiful young dancer at the bar, is wearing the ruby on her toe. Unfortunately, Rosie vanishes before West can make a move.

programme.title: Gunsmoke IV: The Long Ride
programme.desc: "Retired marshal Matt Dillon must clear his name after a lying witness makes him wanted: dead or alive."

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A girl's whip-wielding father does not approve of her romance with Quint.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Joe is found shot in the back and delirious by a pair of cowboys roaming the prairie.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is forced to give refuge to Will Fulton, a young bank robber who was injured while saving Mark's life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Micah Torrance, a once famous lawman, is introduced as a drunken derelict who stumbles into North Fork. Micah, nursing an arm crippled in a gunfight, is hired by Lucas to help out at the ranch. Three outlaws ride into town looking for revenge against Micah.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: After escaping from the railroad builder, Favor attempts to get his drovers back, but they are set on being railroaders. Favor must hatch a scheme to get his men back.

programme.title: Have Gun, Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin defends a schoolmistress who's being theatened for teaching about war crimes that took place during the Civil War.

programme.title: Wanted Dead or Alive
programme.desc: After being arrested for a minor offense, Josh is put on the chain gang and put to work on the local mine.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.sub-title: Mummy's Dummies, Dopey Dicks, Don't Throw That Knife, Cuckoo On A Choo Choo, Blunder Boys, Studio Stoops
programme.desc: "Set in ancient Egypt, the Stooges run a used chariot lot where they unload defective chariots on unsuspecting customers. When they gyp the head of the palace guard, they're brought to the palace to be executed, but instead become royal chamberlains after curing the King's toothache. When they recover some tax money stolen by a corrupt official, the King rewards them with marriage to his daughter. After getting a look at the ugly crone, Moe and Larry select Shemp to be the groom. , It's mindless fun at its best when the Stooges meet a mad scientist in search of a human brain for his headless mechanical man. , The Stooges are hired by a movie studio as publicity men. Their first assignment is to get publicity for Dolly Devore, a pretty starlet. They fake a kidnapping, but the cops won't believe their story. Then the girl is really kidnapped and the Stooges must come to the rescue. Shemp winds up hanging out a tenth story window on an extending telephone. , The Stooges become census takers and wind up in the apartment of a lady whose husband is both jealous and a knife thrower. When the husband arrives home, the boys try to hide, but are discovered, and after dodging some knives, leave on the run. , Larry and Shemp are living in a stolen railroad car. Larry wants to marry his girlfriend, but she won't consent until Shemp marries her sister. Shemp however, is constantly drunk and in love with "Carry", an imaginary giant canary. Moe is an investigator from the railroad, sent to discover how the car was stolen from a moving train. Moe is also in love with Shemp's girl. Shemp winds up with both women, but still prefers his imaginary canary. , A parody of the television series Dragnet. "

programme.title: Svengoolie
programme.desc: "This classic science fiction film featuring Academy Award winning screen legend Clint Eastwood tells the story of a scientist who, while researching the effects of a new synthetic nutrient, releases a giant spider in the American Southwest. A quintessential exercise in pulp horror, "Tarantula" is the drive-in, monster flick that still thrills and chills. "

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: An explosion renders Batman and Robin unconscious and believed dead by the Riddler. When the Dynamic Duo comes to, it's up to Robin to sneak into the museum and stop the plot to raid an ancient sarcophagus.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: Kirk is one of the last survivors who can identify a mass killer lurking among a Shakespearean troupe aboard the Enterprise.

programme.title: Adventures of Superman
programme.desc: Clark and Lois are umpires in a treasure hunt on Dagger Island. One of the heirs is ruthless in his quest and endangers the rest of the party.

programme.title: Adventures of Superman
programme.desc: Inspector Henderson pretends to take a bribe so he can catch a crime boss. Superman intervenes to clear the cop's name.

programme.title: Lost in Space
programme.desc: The Keeper, played by Michael Rennie, is a zookeeper of sorts. He wants to take the children and add them to his collection.

programme.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
programme.desc: Volcanic radioactivity turns a scientist into a werewolf who threatens the Seaview. Meanwhile, Nelson and Crane attempt to snuff out the volcanic island.

programme.title: Land of the Giants
programme.desc: When Clipper is injured by a giant dog, the Earthlings must take him to a pet store owner, but his employee isn't so sympathetic.

programme.title: The Time Tunnel
programme.desc: In 1519, Tony and Doug vow to slow down Cortez's conquest of Mexico.

programme.title: The Invaders
programme.desc: The aliens plot to eliminate Vincent once and for all, attacking a group of "believers".

programme.title: The Life and Times of Grizzly Adams
programme.desc: "A wagon falls on the leg of a settler,"Metcalf". He and his daughter are assisted by Adams,who lets them stay with him. She likes all the animals, mainly a hawk and the next day,despite her dad's warning,goes out exploring on her own."

programme.title: Mutual of Omaha's Wild Kingdom
programme.desc: "Marlin travels to Guyana to join Stan Brock in a cattle drive. Soon they are aware of a jaguar marauding the herd. There is only one thing to do if the drive is to continue … catch the jaguar."

programme.title: Mutual of Omaha's Wild Kingdom
programme.desc: "High in the Rocky Mountains a puma and here three cubs end their first summer together. Soon snow falls and the animals begin their annual trek down to a lower valley."

programme.title: Mutual of Omaha's Wild Kingdom
programme.desc: "Beneath Kilimanjaro lies the Amboseli Game Reserve, last refuge for the remnants of the great cattle and wild animal herds that once roamed east Africa. Marlin and Jim seek a way for coexistence of the animals in the Amboseli."

programme.title: Mutual of Omaha's Wild Kingdom
programme.desc: "Rajastan India lies in an ancient, deserted castle. This is the story of a family of leopards who now occupy this castle."

programme.title: Mutual of Omaha's Wild Kingdom
programme.desc: "A trip to the top of the world … above the Arctic Circle, north of Hudson Bay for a polar bear hunt and a walrus capture."

programme.title: Mutual of Omaha's Wild Kingdom
programme.desc: "A mother cheetah leads her playful cubs over the vast Rhodesian veldt teaching them the ways of defense and hunting."

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.desc: Greg writes a class paper about wanting to become an architect like his dad. Mike reads the paper and is ecstatic and encouraging, but is Greg's heart really in it?

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.sub-title: To Move Or Not To Move
programme.desc: With constant complaints about the size of the house bombarding Mike and Carol, Mike puts the house up for sale and looks into buying a new one. It isn't long after that that the house appears to be haunted.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Fonzie asks Richie to watch after his girl, Denise, while he's out of town at a demolition derby. Denise, upon hearing what Fonzie's asked Richie to do, decides to test Richie's trustworthiness. Richie succumbs to temptation and makes out with Denise at Inspiriation Point, later finding out that she has mononucleosis.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Just when Laverne and Shirley thought they'd have some peace and quiet, look who moves into the building—Lenny and Squiggy are their new second-floor neighbors!

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Gomer's singing voice surprises everyone, especially Barney.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.sub-title: Ricky And Fred Are Tv Fans
programme.desc: With Ricky and Fred glued to a TV fight, their wives go to the local cafe, where service is so slow that Lucy makes change for herself at the cash register and the girls are arrested. They finally prove their innocence and get home to husbands who didn't know they were gone.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Ward comes down hard on Wally after he comes home two hours late, this fuels June and Ward's suspicions that Wally is contemplating joining the Merchant Marines. June had discovered some pamphlets hidden in his dresser drawer. However, little does anyone know, Wally has been getting the information for Lumpy who's seriously thinking of joining.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver gets a new girl in his class and is instantly smitten. He begins walking her home from school but he soon realizes that the girl has an agenda on her mind. Her sole purpose is to get close to Beaver in order to get close to Wally. This leads Beaver to accuse Wally of stealing his girl.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts finish dining with their Grunion, a surfer boy and a girl, and tell the captives they will let them go. Jethro wants to keep his captured girl, but Jed let’s the two go. At the bank, Drysdale, who tells Helen she must take the blame for his stupid mistakes, decides to get his former secretary back. Helen goes to the beach to try to get Jane back, and finds out the Clampetts still believe Grunion are people, a poor excuse, but people nonetheless.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts receive a telegram that says Louellen Aden is coming out to California. When Jed tells Jethro about this, they figure out that she wants to marry Jethro. He gets scared and runs away. Meanwhile, Elly is learning to be a secretary, but is not very good at it. She and Miss Jane go to bring Louellen to the Clampett mansion, and the family learns that she has changed into a lovely young lady.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Gilligan discovers an island bush that produces seeds that when eaten give a person the ability to read the minds of others.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: The Howell's plan a party.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: When Vint installs baby-monitoring intercoms in the house, the Harpers begin eavesdropping on each other—and it isn't long before everyone is upset!

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: When Mama believes she's fallen for a wanted criminal, she decides to capture him herself.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Gopher thinks he recognizes a woman; a pianist debates ending his retirement; a man tries to claim workers' compensation for insanity.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Weaver's Department store is being robbed, presumably by shoplifters. Barney poses as a mannequin to catch a thief.

programme.title: Collector's Call
programme.desc: "Music producer and collector, Jeremy Beaver, started the National Hip Hop Museum to share the culture and history of hip-hop with America, and now he’s sharing it with Collector’s Call, including the turntables that started it all, DJ Kool Herc’s equipment used to invent the genre in 1973, and a collection from the legendary Sugarhill Gang, introduced by member, Master Gee himself. Expert and music historian, JayQuan, attempts a trade with a record-breaking record of his own."

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The sinister Colonel Flagg pops up at the 4077th again, playing his usual spy games, convinced that Hawkeye is a communist sympathizer after he saves the life of a North Korean soldier. Also, an American soldier is less than impressed.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: On a sub-note, Klinger plays the part of a voodoo practitioner to try and get out of the Army.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Mike must decide if he wants to be in the delivery room during the birth of the baby.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Archie's refusal to particpate in a chain letter triggers a string of unlikely events.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Mike becomes the sole support of a growing family when Gloria loses her job because of her pregnancy.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Archie feels abandoned after Edith begins to volunteer part-time at the Sunshine Home for the Elderly.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Cass Elliot And Pat Paulsen
programme.desc: "Guests Cass Elliot and Pat Paulsen. Originally aired on 09/21/70."

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Nanette Fabray And Ken Berry
programme.desc: "Guests Nanette Fabray and Ken Berry. Originally aired on 10/12/70."

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show
programme.desc: Laura sets Sally up with a shy cousin and a disastrous dinner date ensues.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show
programme.desc: Rob has the worst dilemma: choose to travel on business or see his son's school play.

programme.title: The Honeymooners
programme.desc: Ralph, after making a suggestion at work, is laid off. Alice decides to take a job as a secretary, but tells her boss that Ralph is her brother.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An untalented would-be writer's career takes off when the ghost of William Sharespeare writes his script.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A desperate man tries to save his company from bankruptcy.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Howard Bainbridge, a chemical warfare expert who defected to the East, was contaminated by his own experiments and then returned back to the U.S. and his family manor, where his father (a paranoid arch-conservative) had him killed and the body buried.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.sub-title: The Old Man Picked A Lemon
programme.desc: While working as a ranch hand on a California citrus farm, the owner, Leland Hagerman, suddenly dies in an accident and the man's racist and sadistic son, Blaine, arrives to stake his claim to the place and sees everyone as expendable, including Kimble wh

programme.title: Harry O
programme.desc: "Private investigator Harry Orwell helps a young woman save the life she has made for herself from a ruthless man out of her past."

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A woman real estate agent is missing and turns up dead in a vacant home. The detectives' one suspect, the woman's ex-boyfriend, is cleared; then credit card bills for purchases made after the woman's death start appearing.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A purse-snatching dog? This is the case Friday and Gannon must solve. Making things more difficult, victims give different descriptions of the four-legged thief.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and his date join Reed and his expecting wife on a weekend trip to a ghost town, but soon they cross paths with a dangerous motorcycle gang.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Reed's wife is in the hospital expecting their first child, and Reed soon regrets his decision to report for work as usual. Out on patrol, they encounter a drunken man directing traffic, chase down a robbery suspect, investigate the theft of money from washing machines and become involved in a minor traffic accident that results in a major delay.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Ward doesn't take any excuses when he puts his foot down and demands that Wally and Beaver clean the yard. They each reluctantly cancel their plans with Richard and Eddie and get to work but soon find themselves with distractions. This causes them to miss the deadline to call the hauler who is suppose to take all the yard waste away and this leads them to pay Eddie and Lumpy to take care of it.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: "Wally finds himself smack dab in the middle of a lover's quarrel when a woman tries to make her estranged boyfriend jealous by continually making tennis dates with Wally. Wally finds himself in an awkward position when the boyfriend threatens him."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Terrified Typist
programme.desc: While a woman is searching the office of the South African Diamond Company, George Baxter enters to meet Walter Lumis and Duane Jefferson. He notices things in disarray and tries to question the woman, but she makes her escape and seeks out Mason.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Matlock defends himself against a murder charge after a judge who issued him a contempt citation is found dead.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Gillespie is kidnapped and Virgil believes that Tom Dugan is involved.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Verdie Foster's daughter Esther returns to the mountain. After graduating with honors from college, she cannot find a job.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Six years after her husband's hanging, Ma Stone plots her revenge against Matt Dillon by first kidnapping Kitty to use as a lure and then jailing Matt with the intention to hang him.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Hoss is reluctantly made to judge a contest for the most beautiful baby in Virginia City.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark's uncle, Johnny Gibb, a big-time rodeo rider, comes to visit. While Mark idolizes his uncle, Lucas discovers that Johnny is on the run from the law for an Express Office robbery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Judge Burton seeks "justice" against the hangman who hanged his son; the judge who sentenced his son; and Lucas, the man who caught his son. When Judge Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he decides that the best way to serve justice is an eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth, a son for a son.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "An Italian immigrant couple needs help in transporting water for their grapevines to California. Unfortunately, the two men who offer the use of their wagon plan to steal the treasure they've heard the immigrants are carrying in return for their services."

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: The Station 51 basketball team qualifies for the semi-finals. The paramedics rescue victims at a gas explosion. While at basketball practice, the firemen treat an injured gymnast. The night before the big game the firemen get very little sleep: they respond to a number of emergencies, including a workman trapped at a studio.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A typical day in the life of Rosie's bar, complete with AWOL problem drinkers, a bound and gagged Winchester and a gambling scheme.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The impossible happens for the snobbish Charles when he shares an emotional experience with Klinger, who discovers a US nurse, Debbie, finds him and his bizarre attire attractive, while Charles succumbs to the exotic charms of a Korean girl, called Sooni, who he meets at Rosie's Bar.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Talk of a post-war reunion gives B.J. an idea—planning a present-day stateside gathering of 4077th families. He continues to obsess with the idea even under the duress of bug-out instigated by a Chinese breakthrough. Also, Klinger fears that the party will blow his cover, as his mother doesn't know he's stationed in Korea.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A clumsy foot soldier, "Look Out Below" Conway, finds the quickest way to the crew's heart, boosting morale at the 4077th by cooking gourmet delights. Only Colonel Potter, burdened with a personal crisis, is immune from the high spirits enveloping the hospital.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A grumpy Andy agrees to take a few days off and heads up to the lake to relax. Barney and Gomer are in charge, and manage to capture (and lose) an escaped convict who hides in the same woods where Andy just happens to be.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Gomer is convinced that Andy saved his life by putting out a small fire at the filling station. He then begins to repay Andy by becoming his servant.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: After Mrs. Drysdale buys a statue named "Ecstasy," which is nothing but a huge pile of metal scraps, the Clampetts decide to get involved in art to help their neighbor in the contest she is entering. Jed and Jethro buy an authentic Rembrandt, a Sam Rembrandt, and Granny uses her artist cousin as influence to paint Mrs. Drysdale a for-sure winner, thinking the statue she bought has no chance.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: When Sgt. Carter orders him to take a furlough, Gomer becomes a civilian employee at the base.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Crittendon interferes as Hogan tries to help a defecting scientist, whom they were ordered to kill.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan helps Klink fall in love with General Burkhalter's sister to get his mind off not being promoted.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Pat Carroll And Art Carney
programme.desc: "Guests Pat Carroll and Art Carney. Originally aired on 01/04/71."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Betrayed Bride
programme.desc: A recently widowed women becomes tangled in a web of suspicion when she hastily remarries a fortune-hunting Frenchman. When the Frenchman's ex-wife comes looking for him, he turns up shot dead in a swimming pool.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man wakes up one morning to discover that no one knows who he is.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A young man devotes his entire stay at a summer camp to modeling a one-armed clay knight.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A philandering senior manager finds himself being stalked by a previous secretary.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: In order to help break up a narcotics ring, Peggy is recruited to pose as a prostitute.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: "Cannon is called in to investigate police corruption by the mayor of a Midwestern town."

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: While on the search for a missing girl, Betty uncovers a center for white slavers.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A female con-artist uses an evangelistic approach to lure buyers into her pyramid scheme. The Bunco division can't charge her with false advertising, so they prosecute her for operating a lottery.
